name: Smartphone
description: Experience cutting-edge technology with our high-end smartphone. Packed with advanced features, it's your gateway to the future of communication and innovation.

name: Laptop
description: Boost your productivity and gaming experience with our powerful laptop. Engineered for performance, it's your reliable companion for work and play.

name: Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in crystal-clear audio with our noise-canceling headphones. Whether you're on a journey or at home, enjoy the ultimate sound experience.
